S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-3279: Add logic for execution-time sorting of IN list values into DESCENDING order when required. This is necessary when doing IN-list "multi-probing" on some column C for which a DESC sort has been eliminated (by the optimizer). In such a case the row values will come back in the order in which they appear in the IN List, which means the IN list values must themselves be sorted in the correct (descending) order.
